name: Networker
purpose: Gather intelligence from the market and find networking opportunities
accountabilities: Collecting networking opportunities and informing the team about them
Being present, visible and approachable during events
Turning a good contact into a business opportunity by bridging the gathered intelligence with the business creation circle
Planning and creating products to be distributed or used (pens, post-its, shirts, coasters, posters, â€¦

name: Sponsor
purpose: Sponsor events we as Nothing Interactive like to be associated with
accountabilities: Discovering and identifying relevant events, meetups, conferences, group activities
Conceptualising creative approaches to sponsoring (we're small, we need to do things differently)
Figuring out financial support for sponsoring in balance with identified value
Motivating our crew members to be present at sponsored events
Conceptualising and realising physical sponsoring material
